issue.title: [Java] Add checker framework to java build and enable clean run of null analysis
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4742](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4742). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is likely a large task.  We should probably separate it out into subtasks:

1.  Add checker framework so it is incorporated but does not fail the build.

2.  Cleanup issues it finds (likely by module)

3.  Enable full checking.
